auth.session_conflict_message: Another session is already active (IP: {{ip}}, since {{time}}). Do you want to terminate the existing session and log in?

config.apply_confirm_message: This will reload the server configuration. Active calls may be affected. Continue?
config.outbound_calls_via: All outbound calls go through this gateway
config.inbound_default: Inbound calls without specific route go here
config.caller_id_desc: Fixed Caller ID for all outbound calls (optional)
config.country_code_desc: Country code for number normalization (e.g. 49 for Germany)
config.export_desc: Download the current configuration as JSON file
config.import_desc: Upload a JSON configuration file to replace current config
config.import_confirm_text: This will overwrite the current configuration. This action cannot be undone.

invoice.invoice_email_hint: Invoices will be sent to this address

license.trial_expired_text: Your trial period has expired. Please enter a license key to continue using the application.
license.refresh_failed: Failed to refresh license from server
license.server_mismatch: This license is bound to a different server. The system will stop working after 14 days. Please contact support.
license.demo_keys_title: Demo License Keys (copy & paste to activate)
license.error_duplicate: This license key is already activated
license.deactivate_message: Are you sure you want to deactivate license "{{name}}"? The license will be unbound from this server and can be reactivated later.
license.available_hint: These licenses are purchased but not yet installed on this server. Click + to install.
license.no_available: All purchased licenses are already installed on this server.
license.all_licenses_hint: Overview of all purchased licenses across all servers. Licenses can be installed on a server via the License tab.
license.all_licenses_unavailable: License overview is not available for this server. Licenses can be managed via the License tab.

security.whitelist_desc: When enabled, only IPs in the whitelist can register. All other IPs will be blocked.
security.auto_blacklist_desc: Automatically block IPs after too many failed registration attempts.
security.fail2ban_desc: When an IP is blocked repeatedly, add it to Fail2Ban for firewall-level blocking (iptables).
security.add_after_n: Add to Fail2Ban after N blocks
security.external_protected: External SIP IP (protected — cannot be removed)
security.trust_proxy_desc: Use X-Forwarded-For header to identify real client IP when behind a reverse proxy.

route.drag_hint: Drag from handle to handle to create a route • Click edge to delete
route.error_duplicate: This route already exists (same extension, gateway and direction)
route.error_duplicate_inbound: This extension already has an inbound route
route.error_duplicate_outbound: This user already has an outbound route
route.error_license_limit: License limit reached. Disable other routes or purchase additional licenses.

confirm.save_message: Are you sure you want to save these changes?
confirm.delete_message: Are you sure you want to delete "{{name}}"? This action cannot be undone.
confirm.delete_generic: Are you sure you want to delete this item? This action cannot be undone.

unsaved.title: Unsaved Changes
unsaved.message: You have unsaved changes. What would you like to do?
unsaved.data_loss_message: All unsaved changes will be permanently lost. Are you sure you want to continue?

validation.invalid_ip: Must be a valid IPv4 or IPv6 address (e.g. 192.168.1.1 or ::1)
validation.invalid_username: Only letters, numbers, dots, hyphens, underscores
validation.leave_empty_keep: Leave empty to keep current password
validation.host_protocol: Must start with http:// or https://
validation.host_invalid: Must be a valid domain, IP address, or localhost

system.fs_domain_desc: SIP domain for this server (e.g. sip.example.com)
system.external_sip_ip_desc: Public IP address for SIP signaling (NAT traversal)
system.codec_prefs_desc: Select audio/video codecs. Order determines negotiation priority.
system.server_desc: Server connection and SIP configuration settings.

countdown.activity_reset: Move mouse or press a key to reset
countdown.modal_message: You will be logged out due to inactivity. Click X or move mouse to stay.

error.not_found_message: Sorry, the page you're looking for doesn't exist or has been moved.
error.boundary_message: An unexpected error occurred on this page. You can try reloading or navigate to another page.

integrations.title: Integrations
integrations.subtitle: Connect your SIP Wrapper with third-party services and platforms.
integrations.license_hint: Integrations require a separate license for each service. Contact sales to activate.
integrations.vapi_desc: AI voice agent platform for building conversational AI phone experiences.
integrations.vapi_detail: VAPI enables you to create intelligent voice agents that handle phone calls autonomously. Integrate your SIP Wrapper with VAPI to route inbound calls to AI agents or launch outbound AI-driven campaigns.
integrations.vapi_features: Inbound call routing to AI agents|Outbound AI call campaigns|Real-time call transcription|Custom voice & language models|Webhook-based call events
integrations.odoo_desc: All-in-one business management suite — CRM, ERP, accounting, and more.
integrations.odoo_detail: Connect your telephony system with Odoo to enable click-to-call from CRM contacts, automatic call logging, and real-time call popups with customer information.
integrations.odoo_features: Click-to-call from CRM contacts|Automatic call logging in Odoo|Incoming call popup with customer info|Call history per contact|VoIP integration with Odoo apps
integrations.zoho_desc: Cloud-based business tools — CRM, helpdesk, analytics, and telephony integration.
integrations.zoho_detail: Integrate Zoho CRM and Zoho Desk with your SIP Wrapper to enable seamless telephony workflows, automatic ticket creation, and call analytics directly in your Zoho dashboard.
integrations.zoho_features: Click-to-call from Zoho CRM|Auto-create support tickets on missed calls|Call recording linked to contacts|Analytics dashboard integration|Zoho PhoneBridge compatible
integrations.retell_desc: Build and deploy AI voice agents with natural-sounding conversations.
integrations.retell_detail: Retell AI provides ultra-realistic voice agents. Connect your SIP infrastructure to deploy AI agents that handle customer inquiries, appointment scheduling, and more with human-like voice quality.
integrations.retell_features: Ultra-realistic AI voice agents|Multi-language support|Custom conversation flows|Real-time sentiment analysis|Seamless SIP trunk integration
integrations.bland_desc: AI phone calling platform for automated outbound and inbound calls.
integrations.bland_detail: Bland AI specializes in high-volume automated phone calls. Integrate with your SIP Wrapper to launch large-scale outbound campaigns or handle inbound call routing with AI-powered agents.
integrations.bland_features: High-volume outbound campaigns|AI-powered inbound handling|Custom call scripts|Call transfer to live agents|Detailed call analytics & reporting
integrations.hubspot_desc: CRM platform with marketing, sales, and customer service integration.
integrations.hubspot_detail: Connect HubSpot CRM with your telephony system to enable click-to-call, automatic call logging, deal-stage triggers, and customer communication tracking across all channels.
integrations.hubspot_features: Click-to-call from HubSpot contacts|Automatic call activity logging|Deal pipeline call triggers|Contact timeline integration|Call recording & playback
integrations.premium_desc: Priority support with dedicated account manager and guaranteed SLAs.
integrations.premium_detail: Premium Support gives you direct access to our engineering team with guaranteed response times, a dedicated account manager, and proactive system monitoring to ensure maximum uptime.
integrations.premium_features: Guaranteed response time SLA|Dedicated account manager|Proactive system monitoring|Priority bug fixes & patches|Direct engineering team access|Quarterly business reviews

vip.title: VIP Features
vip.subtitle: Exclusive premium features unlocked with your Premium Support license.
vip.feature_priority_desc: Get priority access to our support team with guaranteed response times.
vip.feature_analytics_desc: Deep call analytics, quality metrics, and custom reporting dashboards.
vip.feature_support_desc: A dedicated account manager to help with onboarding and optimization.
vip.feature_api_desc: Access to advanced API endpoints for custom integrations and automation.

setup.title: Company Setup
setup.description: Please provide your company details to get started. This information is required and cannot be changed later.
setup.company_id_hint: Unique identifier — only letters, numbers, and one hyphen
setup.company_id_format: Only letters, numbers, and max one hyphen (e.g. my-company)
setup.display_name_hint: Your company name for display purposes
setup.email_hint: We will use this email for important notifications
setup.invalid_email: Please enter a valid email address
setup.disposable_email: Disposable/temporary email addresses are not allowed

demo.title: Demo Mode
demo.description: Run the admin panel with simulated data. No real backend connection needed.
demo.active_notice: Demo mode enabled — no real server connection
demo.reset_desc: Reset all demo data to factory defaults. All changes will be lost.
demo.reset_message: All demo data will be reset to factory defaults. All your changes (users, gateways, routes, etc.) will be permanently lost. Are you sure?
